name: satloop-contracts
description: SatLoop leveraged loop staker contracts â€“ Bitcoin L1 / OP_NET

scripts.build:satyield: npx asc src/SatYield.ts  --outFile build/SatYield.wasm  --textFile build/SatYield.wat  --optimize --runtime stub
scripts.build:vault: npx asc src/VaultToken.ts --outFile build/VaultToken.wasm --textFile build/VaultToken.wat --optimize --runtime stub
scripts.build:satloop: npx asc src/SatLoop.ts   --outFile build/SatLoop.wasm   --textFile build/SatLoop.wat   --optimize --runtime stub
scripts.build: npm run build:satyield && npm run build:vault && npm run build:satloop
